channel.title: Container on DistributedFog
channel.description: Recent content in Container on DistributedFog

item.title: CSI
item.description: The goal of the Container Storage Interface (CSI) is to define and interface that will enable storage vendors to develop a plugin once and have it work across a number of container orchestration (CO) systems. CSI community The CSI specification is an emerging specification that defines an interface along with the minimum operational and packaging recommendations for a storage provider (SP) to implement a CSI compatible plugin.
